name: part_006
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Dec 19, 2021)【3DLIVE】メルキス3周年LIVE♡Xmas Party【#メルキス３周年ライブ】 [6J010KA__RQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Yozora Mel continues her performance of 'ChocoLove' with a brief MC interlude in the middle.
Yozora Mel performs a cover of 'Hokori Takaki Idol'.

subtitles.original: …虜にしちゃうの
subtitles.english: ...and captivate you.

subtitles.original: 心拍数 急上昇
subtitles.english: My heart rate is soaring!

subtitles.original: みんな夢中に ズッキュンド
subtitles.english: Everyone's infatuated, Zukkyun-do!

subtitles.original: 痛いの痛いの飛んでいけ
subtitles.english: Pain, pain, fly away!

subtitles.original: 不安な顔より笑顔見せて
subtitles.english: Show me a smile instead of a worried face.

subtitles.original: めちゃときめいて受け取って
subtitles.english: Feel the flutter and receive it,

subtitles.original: 甘いチョコのような時を
subtitles.english: a time like sweet chocolate.

subtitles.original: ここに痛いの痛いのもう困っちゃう
subtitles.english: It hurts right here, oh, I'm in trouble.

subtitles.original: 不意打ちにチョコっとドキめく
subtitles.english: A sudden little sweet heart-throb.

subtitles.original: じらしちゃうわよだめ、もうちょっと
subtitles.english: I'll tease you, no, just a bit more.

subtitles.original: 君の声を もっと聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice more.

subtitles.original: 不安なんて抱えてらしくないなんて思ってた
subtitles.english: I thought it wasn't like me to be carrying such anxiety.

subtitles.original: 全部、全部、丸ごと包み込んで
subtitles.english: I'll wrap it all, all up,

subtitles.original: 溶かしてあげる
subtitles.english: and melt it for you.

subtitles.original: みんな、メルキスライブ楽しんでる？
subtitles.english: Everyone, are you enjoying Melkiss Live?

subtitles.original: もっともっとみんなと一緒にいたいから
subtitles.english: I want to be with you all more and more,

subtitles.original: 最後まで楽しんで見てってねー！
subtitles.english: so please enjoy watching until the very end!

subtitles.original: どうしたって何したって気持ちは同じなんだよね
subtitles.english:
No matter what happens, no matter what I do,
my feelings remain the same.

subtitles.original: ここだってどこだって想いは伝わるから
subtitles.english:
Because my feelings will reach you,
whether here or anywhere else.

subtitles.original: 声にして、文字にして、勇気出して伝えてよ
subtitles.english:
Put it into words, put it into text,
be brave and tell me.

subtitles.original: 今日だって、いつだって、あー、愛してるの
subtitles.english: Today, always, ah, I love you.

subtitles.original: Ah, Ah... Tweet dreams...
subtitles.english: Ah, Ah... Tweet dreams...

subtitles.original: 隠さないで、ちゃんと教えて
subtitles.english: Don't hide it, tell me properly,

subtitles.original: 君のこと全部を 頂戴
subtitles.english: give me everything about you.

subtitles.original: きっと痛いの痛いの飛んでって
subtitles.english: I'm sure the pain will fly away,

subtitles.original: 過ごしちゃうくらい お願い
subtitles.english: so much so that we'll lose track of time, please.

subtitles.original: 高鳴る心聞いてみて、感じてほしいの
subtitles.english: Listen to my pounding heart, I want you to feel it.

subtitles.original: 会いたいわ すぐ飛んでって
subtitles.english: I want to see you, I'll fly to you right now,

subtitles.original: 過ごしちゃうくらい お願い
subtitles.english: so much so that we'll lose track of time, please.

subtitles.original: めちゃときめいて受け取って
subtitles.english: Feel the flutter and receive it,

subtitles.original: 甘く蕩けちゃうよな時を
subtitles.english: a time that'll melt you sweetly.

subtitles.original: 隣にいたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to be by your side.

subtitles.original: Ah, Ah... Tweet dreams...
subtitles.english: Ah, Ah... Tweet dreams...

subtitles.original: ChocoLove!
subtitles.english: ChocoLove!

subtitles.original: 私のこと 知ってますか？
subtitles.english: Do you know who I am?

subtitles.original: 可愛く見えてますか？
subtitles.english: Do I look cute to you?

subtitles.original: 私の歌 どうだろうな？
subtitles.english: How about my singing?

subtitles.original: うまく歌えてますか？
subtitles.english: Am I singing well?

subtitles.original: 衣装だとか メイクだとか
subtitles.english: My outfit, my makeup...

subtitles.original: 可愛く見えてますか？
subtitles.english: do they make me look cute?

subtitles.original: 振り付けとか ファンサとかも
subtitles.english: My choreography and fan service,

subtitles.original: 喜んでもらえますか？
subtitles.english: are they making you happy?

subtitles.original: 手が冷たくなって 足は震えてる
subtitles.english: My hands have gone cold, and my legs are trembling.

subtitles.original: それでも戦いたい アイドルだから
subtitles.english: But I still want to fight, because I'm an idol.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿にする奴は嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate those who mock me,

subtitles.original: 蔑まれるのも嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate being looked down upon.

subtitles.original: アイドルなんかという言葉を
subtitles.english: Don't say things like 'just an idol'

subtitles.original: 見てもいないくせに言うな
subtitles.english: when you haven't even seen me.

subtitles.original: 頑張りを笑うな 努力を否定するな
subtitles.english: Don't laugh at my hard work, don't deny my efforts.

subtitles.original: 夢売事とか強制するな
subtitles.english: Don't force me to 'sell dreams'.

subtitles.original: アイドルなんかという言葉は
subtitles.english: Words like 'just an idol'...

subtitles.original: この世で一番大嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate them more than anything in this world.

subtitles.original: プライベート見えないから
subtitles.english: You can't see my private life,

subtitles.original: 分からないと思います
subtitles.english: so I don't think you can understand.
